.order-cell.title: Drag unscheduled orders
.order-cell.content:
Dragging an order onto the schedule board will create a chain of tasks based on the order template.

Please note this table is powered by the Bryntum Grid, which is licensed separately.

.b-sch-event-content.title: Demo tasks belong to an order
.b-sch-event-content.content: When you reschedule an order, all successors are moved too
